org.trianacode.gui.util

Class CompileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.util.CompileUtil

  • public final class CompileUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    CompileUtil is a class which finds the java compiler and compiles a java source file. Its intended to be used for the Triana units.
